description: Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii 'Kobold') is a beautiful, low-maintenance shrub with amazing ornamental qualities. This versatile plant can be used as a border, hedge, mass planting, or specimen plant and can even be used to add interest to wooded areas. Its thorny foliage provides excellent pest protection and its bright yellow flowers attract butterflies and pollinators. Its dark green leaves turn a brilliant red in autumn and its interesting, spiny fruit are beloved by birds. With its extreme hardiness and tolerance to drought, Japanese barberry is a great choice for both novice and expert gardeners.
